Function reference

Using duckplyr for single data frames

as_duckplyr_df()
Convert to a duckplyr data frame
is_duckplyr_df()
Class predicate for duckplyr data frames

Using duckplyr for all data frames

methods_overwrite() methods_restore()
Forward all dplyr methods to duckplyr

df_from_csv

config
Configuration options
